poses.description: Standing ready, pickaxe held at side or resting
poses.pickaxe_position: LOW - at side, near waist/hip level, or resting on shoulder

poses.description: Beginning wind-up, pickaxe starting to rise
poses.pickaxe_position: RISING - moving from low to mid height
poses.body_position: Slight lean back, preparing for swing

poses.description: Mid wind-up, pickaxe at shoulder height
poses.pickaxe_position: MID-HIGH - at or above shoulder level
HIGH - ABOVE the head, at peak of backswing

poses.description: Beginning downswing, pickaxe starting to come down
poses.pickaxe_position: DESCENDING - moving from overhead toward front
poses.body_position: Starting to lean forward, weight shifting

poses.description: Mid-swing, pickaxe in front of body
poses.pickaxe_position: MID-FRONT - in front of body, around chest/waist height
GROUND - at or near ground level, extended forward

validation_criteria.pose_validation: Each frame must match expected pickaxe position
validation_criteria.sequence_validation: Pickaxe must travel LOW → HIGH → LOW

failure_conditions: Pickaxe stays in same position across all frames
Motion doesn't read as downward swing
